MonsterTrait.Name: Devil's Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The chort devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The chort devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: blur, magic circle, teleportation 3/day: scorching ray (5 rays) 1/day each: dispel magic, dominate person, flame strike, haste

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The chort devil makes three melee attacks with its flaming ranseur, or three melee attacks with its claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Charisma damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Flaming Ranseur
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Devilish Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: Any weapons wielded by a chort devil do 10 (3d6) fire damage in addition to their normal weapon damage.
